channel.title: Comments on: השירות הצבאי שלי – חלק רביעי
channel.description: Amit Schreiber's Blog | הבלוג של עמית שרייבר

item.title: By: xtreeq
item.dc:creator: xtreeq
item.description: Well, I'm waiting for your prison story (you didn't say which one it was)... Maybe I'll write my own prison stories too (both of them :-), We can compare notes.
item.content:encoded:
Well, I’m waiting for your prison story (you didn’t say which one it was)…
Maybe I’ll write my own prison stories too (both of them :-), We can compare notes.
